Daily BMP Optimizer https://shepherd.prod.target.com/workflow/90353649 7:45 am IST - Daily  Pinterest Optimizer https://shepherd.prod.target.com/workflow/90353344 9:00 am IST - Daily Upsell https://shepherd.prod.target.com/workflow /1081604766:00 pm IST - Sunday GAM forecast requesthttps://shepherd.prod.target.com/workflow/69263667 3:30 pm IST - Daily Optimization Liftt https://shepherd.prod.target.com/workflow /110377977Triggers once upsell weekly flow is complete on Sunday To debug production workflows, check logs in  folder in prod bucket tgt-cnf-prod-ds-optimus/ray_logs 1. 2. a. b. c. d. e. 3. a. 4. a. 5. 6. Data TablesRecommend ationsprd_optimus_fds.tcom_campaign_recommendation  prd_optimus_fds.tcom_campaign_recommendations_vxai (This populates after 1 pm) Sometimes need to repair this table, the data is generally copied to HDFS path but the partitions are not added. So do repair before querying on this table 'tgt-cnf-prod-ds-optimus/budget_optimization/optimizer_output/tcom_campaign_recommendation' Recommendations are also written to this prod bucket  Recommend ations Statusprd_optimus_fds.inflight_online_acknowledgement_vw  Features prd_optimus_fds.tcom_online_feature_data Post policy feature calculation https://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/tgt-cnf-prod-ds-optimus/budget_optimization/feature_output   /tcom_policy_feature_data/ Tcom Optimization Liftprd_optimus_fds.tcom_optimization_lift Ray Logs and datahttps://console.cloud.google.com/storage/browser/tgt-cnf-prod-ds-optimus;tab=objects? forceOnBucketsSortingFiltering=true&authuser=0&project=tgt-cnf-prod-ds- optimus&prefix=&forceOnObjectsSortingFiltering=false Previous Year OKRsOKRs | Results Tracking   Previous OKR Methodology:   Lift Methodology - tcom - 2023 New OKR Methodology:   https://git.target.com/Roundel-Optimus-Platform/optimization_lift 2024 OKRs:   Impact comparison for 2023 vs 2024 This year we'll have to use the optimization lift workflow to generate the OKR numbers  Previous Year peak support Peak Support   Optimus Version ManagementVersion Management for Optimus   Optimus Next Step OKR dashboard: Srivatchala is working on it Alerting mechanism using Optimus logs  Number of input campaign and lines Number of campaigns and lines with Optimal solution Number of campaigns dropped in all test cases Number of campaigns with explainability generated  Number of final lines and campaigns with recommendations  Enhancements with GenAI summary Sometimes it hallucinates and doesn't follow the system prompt Experiment with adding system prompt and user prompt to get better summary  Optimus enhancements Remove strategizer - have a fixed schedule say every 3 days and optimize, since we have auto approval in place Holistic Optimization  Inventory Optimization productionisation

So do repair before querying on this table 'tgt-cnf-prod-ds-optimus/budget_optimization/optimizer_output/tcom_campaign_recommendation' Recommendations are also written to this prod bucket

Previous Year OKRsOKRs | Results Tracking Previous OKR Methodology: Lift Methodology - tcom - 2023 New OKR Methodology: https://git.target.com/Roundel-Optimus-Platform/optimization_lift 2024 OKRs: Impact comparison for 2023 vs 2024 This year we'll have to use the optimization lift workflow to generate the OKR numbers
Previous Year peak supportPeak Support
Optimus Version ManagementVersion Management for Optimus
Optimus Next Step 1. OKR dashboard: Srivatchala is working on it 2. Alerting mechanism using Optimus logs a. Number of input campaign and lines b. Number of campaigns and lines with Optimal solution c. Number of campaigns dropped in all test cases d. Number of campaigns with explainability generated e. Number of final lines and campaigns with recommendations 3. Enhancements with GenAI summary a. Sometimes it hallucinates and doesn't follow the system prompt Experiment with adding system prompt and user prompt to get better summary 4. Optimus enhancements a. Remove strategizer - have a fixed schedule say every 3 days and optimize, since we have auto approval in place 5. Holistic Optimization 6. Inventory Optimization productionisation
